summary: In 1865, the small Southern town of Walsburg has become so dangerous, that Parson Josiah Doziah Gray gives his sermons while holding a gun.
cast: Joel McCrea|Ellen Drew|Dean Stockwell|Alan Hale|Lewis Stone|James Mitchell|Amanda Blake|Juano Hernandez|Charles Kemper|Connie Gilchrist|Ed Begley|Jack Lambert|Arthur Hunnicutt|Marshall Thompson|James Arness|Jessie Arnold|Polly Bailey|Al Bain|Margaret Bert|Helen Brown|Matilda Caldwell|Robert Cherry|Bill Clauson|Chuck Courtney|Fred Datig Jr.|Adeline De Walt Reynolds|Helen Eby-Rock|Edmund Glover|Jessica Grayson|Eula Guy|Ralph Hodges|Jimmie Horan|Dick Johnstone|Victor Kilian|Al Kunde|Baron James Lichter|Mathew McCue|Philo McCullough|Patricia Miller|Frank Mills|Howard M. Mitchell|Rhea Mitchell|Jimmy Moss|Patsy O'Byrne|Norman Ollestad|Frank Pharr|James Pierce|Carl Pitti|'Snub' Pollard|Alice Richey|Buddy Roosevelt|Phil Schumacher|Tex Terry|Jack Tornek|Connie Van|Ben Watson|Wilson Wood
title: Estrellas en mi corona
